name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience in building high-performance applications, leveraging strong expertise in **Python**, **Docker**, **CI/CD**, and **GitLab CI**. Proficient in implementing automation and virtualization strategies, utilizing tools like **Jenkins**, **Grafana**, and **Kibana** to enhance system performance and monitoring. Demonstrated problem-solving skills and effective communication abilities for collaborating with cross-functional teams.
Additionally skilled in hands-on frontend and backend development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Expert in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Extensive experience in compliance-driven development aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps and AI/ML-powered platforms, showcasing expert capabilities in model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
